event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Dirty (eviction)
event.description: A dirty line was replaced and evicted.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Requests
event.description: Csw requests = Csw Reads + Csw Writes + Csw other ops.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: TQ bank conflict issue stall
event.description: The TQ can't issue due to a bank conflict.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Input request async FIFO stall
event.description: The Csw input request async FIFO is stalled.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Output request async FIFO stall
event.description: The Csw output request async FIFO is stalled.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Output data async FIFO stall
event.description: The Csw output data FIFO is stalled.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: SIP insertions with R bit set
event.description: SIP insertions with R bit set.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: SIP insertions with R bit clear
event.description: SIP insertions with R bit clear.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: DIP insertions with R bit set
event.description: DIP insertions with R bit set.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: DIP insertions with R bit clear
event.description: DIP insertions with R bit clear.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: DIP insertions force R bit set
event.description: DIP insertions where filter predicts not to set R bit and DIP sets it.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Replacements
event.description: Clean or dirty data is replaced.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Old R replacements
event.description: Replaced data is marked old and R=1.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Old NR replacements
event.description: Replaced data is marked old and R=0.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Young R replacements
event.description: Replaced data is marked young and R=1.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Young NR replacements
event.description: Replaced data is marked young and R=0.

event.title: L3 Cache
event.name: Voltage droop detected
event.description: Voltage droop detected by L3C voltage droop detector.
